SRS.title: Social Group Travel Planner App
SRS.description: A collaborative trip planning and discovery platform where verified users can create, join, and manage travel groups, interact with AI for location suggestions, and plan experiences in real time.

stack.ai: Gemini API for location-aware travel assistance

modules.name: User Authentication & Verification
modules.description: Handles secure user onboarding and login.
features: Email-based registration and login with OTP verification
Google OAuth login
Forgot password & OTP recovery flow
Store minimal profile: name, avatar, bio, verification status

modules.name: Trip Discovery & Join Requests
modules.description: Users can explore and request to join public or invite-only trips.
features: Browse public trips with filters (date, location, tags, budget)
Search by destination or interest
View trip preview: name, description, dates, current members
Request to join or apply via invite link
Visibility: public, private, link-restricted with optional password or expiry

modules.name: Trip Creation & Configuration
modules.description: Users can create customizable trips with role-based collaboration.
features: Create trips with basic info: title, description, duration, cover photo
Set visibility level (public/private/link)
Generate invite links with optional password & expiry
Add tags (e.g., trekking, beach, party)

modules.name: Trip Dashboard: Itinerary + Chat + AI
modules.description: Centralized trip workspace with tools for planning and coordination.
features: Create & edit itinerary timeline (drag-and-drop)
Add events with time, location, description, map link
Comment on specific itinerary items
Group chat per trip with media sharing
AI assistant (via Gemini) for smart suggestions based on location, group size, food type, interests, etc.
Trip lock feature to freeze edits before X days of start date (configurable by admin)

modules.name: Notifications & Updates
features: Push/email alerts for join requests, approvals, promotions
Notify when itinerary changes (for locked trips, notify Admin)
Daily reminders of upcoming trip events
Activity feed (e.g., 'Alice joined', 'Trip updated')

modules.name: AI Assistant (Gemini)
modules.description: Smart contextual assistant within trip pages.
features: Suggest local attractions, food, and accommodations
Customize responses based on weather, time, group size
Support conversational queries (e.g., 'Things to do at night in Manali')
Offer emergency contact or safety info on demand

modules.name: Optional Enhancements
features: Trip cost splitter & expense logging
Shared media album (upload + tag people)
Live location sharing during trip window (opt-in)
Post-trip feedback and anonymous safety review

nonFunctionalRequirements: Responsive design for desktop and mobile browsers
Rate-limited AI API queries to manage costs
User data encryption and secure auth handling
outOfScopeForMVP: Full native mobile app (PWA suggested instead)
